website_summaries.verdict: Autel is a top innovator in automotive diagnostic tools, and this one tops the list – delivers accurate codes quickly and effectively and is easy to keep up-to-date for changing diagnostic needs.
pros: Capable of doing everything you need in automotive diagnostics – reads a full spectrum of diagnostic codes
Works for almost any vehicle 1996 and newer
cons: It's pricey, but it's also the most comprehensive OBDII scanner on our list

customer_reviews.title: Upgrades not current for common vehicle models even three years after the model has been intro'd
customer_reviews.text: Likes - Tool is easy to use, uses the VIN to identify the make and model it is connected to, which has its' good and bad points. Dislikes - Available software updates are missing many common models. For example as of Aug 2020, Using the latest software upgrades, Toyota Tacoma trucks are only covered up through 2017 models. Needed improvements - Autel needs to get on the ball and upgrade available software to include recent models. No excuse to not have software available for common vehicles like Toyota Trucks.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Rider

customer_reviews.title: Excellent OBDII Scanner.  Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: Stepped up to the 802 from a basic OBDII engine code reader I've had for years. Owning a Mercedes C230, the basic engine code reader was just not enough. Triggered an SRS code while replacing wiper control switch and local auto parts stores did not have anything more than basic engine readers. Purchased this and it's been a great unit so far. Was able to clear SRS message and discover other codes. It gives more details about codes than a typical engine code scanner. Definitely worth the investment. Not a professional mechanic, but I do all work except engine/transmission on all our vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Ribs & Blues

customer_reviews.title: Autel MD806 Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my needs. Used on a KIA to diagnose problems before taking it to the dealer to repair the Sorento again. Knew what needed to be done and what was not needed. Saved some money on the repair by turning down some so-called repairs that was not needed. A good investment in this tool. Recommend highly. I have not needed to contact tech support yet. The only complaint is the LCD screen is a little hard to read in direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Ted a Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not up to date even after going online to update it
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to give more information than my older cheaper unit, but I have a 2019 Genesis G70 and this has no information, on my now two year old car. I can't even use it to reset my oil change interval or any of the other service items. Could not read any information on the ABS or SRS system or Parking pad brake or any of the many other service items this is supposed to do, because you have to select the car your working on and it has no G70 either as a Genesis or Hyundai. A bit disappointed and hope for a better update soon.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E. Cinader

customer_reviews.title: No program chip included
customer_reviews.text: Without the chip card it is useless. I called Autel they said the chip came with the unit. I inquired as to where that would be and he said it would be installed. It is was not in the box. It was not installed. I have been too busy to take off to call the tech support due to the hours they take calls and the different time zones I am at work before they start and I am still working when they are gone for the day. I hate to give a negative review but !$%$^ if I didn't need/want it?????
customer_reviews.author: woody givens

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Tons of information on problem codes and live data for your vehicle. Can be used on multiple vehicles. And you can selectively update the software for life. You'll be surprised what you find. I called tech support when doing the initial setup and was greeted immediately (no waiting), the rep was knowledgeable and friendly. You can print out your result and research the code faults online. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Allen R. Webber

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Works great as described, updates are super easy only need sd card slot or adapter to your computer and will update from autel site. Super easy to use, would recommend for anyone needing a great scanner for home or professional use, and FREE UPDATES!
customer_reviews.author: ben harris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! The only negative so far is that is ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to realize the full potential of the tool, you are going to have to do your homework. This things pulls information out of things you didn't even know you had. Awesome! The only negative so far is that is will freeze up occasionally. While it is slightly annoying, all you have to do is unplug it and start over again. For a tool in this price range, with this much capability . . . not a big deal. Reviews on high dollar scanners indicate the same thing happens with them. Can't be beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Coopersville

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, but does not read transmission codes as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool that allows the user to clear check engine light and other common error codes. It monitors car components in real time, which is great for diagnosing a range of issues. The manufacturer claims this unit can check error codes from the transmission (TCM) but this is completely untrue for my 2009 Dodge Journey. Autel send customers in an endless loop of suggesting system updates from their website, which refers users back to customer support, which refers back to the website. Horrible customer service. If it wasn't for the lack of transmission scanning this would be a 5-star review. There are many cheaper scanners for $70-100 that will do the same tasks as this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a must tool if you have numerous cars and like to keep up on their performance
customer_reviews.text: This is a must tool if you have numerous cars and like to keep up on their performance. I am not a mechanic and have used this to diagnose issues on numerous vehicles. Family of 3 Volvo's and 1 VW and this has worked great on them all, I really like that I can pull codes and know what is going on with the cars prior to sending them off to the shop. I do what ever maintenance I can at home but know my limits. I recommend this to any "Shade Tree Mechanic" that is looking for a great dino tool.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Good scanner.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a multi vehicle scanner and not just one brand, or having to pay for extra brands. The updates are also nice that are free for lifetime. This is a full feature scanner that will scan any module on vehicles. Only thing I wish it was able to preform key fob programming. Customer support was able to help with all my questions before placing a order. There helpfulness is why I went with this scanner vs another brand. Maybe one day I will upgrade to there full 2 way diagnostics scanners.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb H

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This product is specified for Mercedes/Sprinter Vans, but doesn’t come with the adapter that is needed for it. Even when calling the actual manufacturer, they don’t even know that it NEEDS and adapter. It was supposed to come with everything needed. If the manufacturer doesn’t even know or care that they need to let customers know that an adapter is needed, I wonder what other issues there are with this after learning of their complete incompetence. BUYER BEWARE! If I could give it less than 1 star I would.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Best diagnostic code reader in sub-$200 range
customer_reviews.text: I also own the #2 competing product to this scanner, the Innova 3060d, which fails in many respects to this comprehensive Autel. Specifically the Innova refuses to read transmission deep codes from Ford, which is a huge part of my need. So far there has been NO SYSTEM in any domestic or import passenger or diesel vehicle that I have not been able to read EVERY COMPUTER SYSTEM in.
customer_reviews.author: williewiskers

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome but Cable doesnt fit into many cars, stiff and pins wont go in.
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is just great for the price. I have used it to successfully diagnose issues with even airmatic Mercedes cars. The only issue is the obd plug, the pins domt fit in some cars!! For instance I couldn't pug it into a 2010 Mercedes c300 and a 2009 Toyota Sienna. I think there's a major problem with the design and finishing of the cable. I have the little Autel MS 309, and it plugs into every single car I have used it on for the past 3 years but this one has the pins finished wrongly. Autel needs to test this and possibly offer the cables for free!
customer_reviews.author: Kent C.

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed. First thing I did was update it. Then I diagnosed an air bag light. Then I monitored live data miss fire counts, played around with it, able to access all modules, even HVAC and Entertainment system. Nice, money well spent. I was putting it off for years because I just couldn't stomach spending the kind of money they wanted. This unit is affordable and seems to do everything I need. I would recommend to anyone looking for a decent priced capable scan tool.
customer_reviews.author: The good, the bad and the ugly

customer_reviews.title: Very Capable Scanner - Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This scan tool is very sophisticated. My husband was able to access fault codes on his Chevy Tahoe, and not just the check engine light generic faults. The scanner enabled a complete analysis of the AC system. He was able to view the position of the blending doors (hot / cold air mixing), check the commands, the temperature sensors etc. He could even plot charts of the system reacting to changes in the temperature settings. Its easy to use also - our 12 year old son used it to check for fault codes after the blending actuators were changed! This is way more capable than a regular OBD2 scanner and highly recommended for people doing repair work at home.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Do not believe it is an all module scanner !
customer_reviews.text: Received it today, did the updates, only bought it because it says it's an all module scanner. try to scan HVAC system on 01 DeVille. And it's not available. Called customer support and was given the message no one is available after waiting for 20 minutes,Twice. Tried the chat feature and was told it is an all module scanner but doesn't cover every model. Scince I can read abs, SRS and other modules,my caddy must be covered. So long story short buy the 50 dollar one and get the same results.
customer_reviews.author: John Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great device on vehicles it supports.
customer_reviews.text: The device is simple to use. Installed the software on my Windows 10 computer. Updated the software first, then performed the updates on the SD card. Works fine on my brothers 2002 Ford F-350. Doesn't work on my 2005 Jeep Liberty CRD. I returned it because it didn't work on my vehicle. Otherwise is easy to use. Comes in a nice case with the OBD2 cable and USB cable. The USB cable is used to power the scanner when not plugged into a vehicle or to use the software to print. Can only update the device by removing the SD card and plugging it into a computer.
customer_reviews.author: cowboy7381

customer_reviews.title: Complete coverage at a low price.
customer_reviews.text: While it lacks the control functions of a bi-directional scanner, the all systems version of the MD802 is able to pull trouble codes from systems you didn't know stores codes. Heated seat codes? You got em. Cd changer loading error? You got the code. Instrument panel malfunction? You got the codes. The oil reset guide is handy, although a bit slow to navigate compared to pulling it up on your phone. Electric parking brake function works like a charm. If you don't need bi-directional functionality, there's no reason to spend any more money than this.
customer_reviews.author: James Davis

customer_reviews.title: Reads and clears all Modules in most vehicles.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. Reads and clears all modules in most vehicle makes and models excepting some rare supercars and AMG models. Should be more than enough for most DIY or home mechanics. As always, Amazon shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: TechKING7

customer_reviews.title: It found a transmission error code on a 2001 jetta ...
customer_reviews.text: It found a transmission error code on a 2001 jetta tdi that a cheaper scanner did not read, and kept me from buying that car. It has live data for fuel trims, but also live data for transmission fluid temperature and for transmission input and output shafts speeds (on an 04 BMW 325i). Having said that it is big, with a long cable, and an awkward interface, so I usually use a smartphone app with bluetooth obd2 plug to read codes and check fuel trims
customer_reviews.author: LeverFile

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Had to do a regen on a 2014 Durmax shop was charging my buddy 5000 said he needed a new DPF filter and after a couple force rengens the truck is good as new. Also cleard a SRS that that had been on my car for years. So far great tool just need to play with it more.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Autel Scanner MD802 Maxidiag Elite Full System Diagnoses - Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: I am now using this Diagnostic tool to run code tests on my Dodge truck, Mazda6 and Hyundai. It has already assisted my in troubleshooting and EVAP code on the truck. I have other code testers but none of them provide the same level of troubleshooting that the Autel Scanner provides. I am quite happy with this code scanner so far. Great job Autel...
customer_reviews.author: Barry of Orange

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding tool and very simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent purchase. Set up and updating was very easy. We had my moms Chevy Aveo to the dealership and an other shop several ti.es for a intermittent check engine light. Neither shop could find and issue. I used this scanner and immediately detected that the fuel pump sending unit was bad. I was able to easily clear codes after diagnosing and making repairs on newer chevy 4x4. Great tool! Now all of my friend are asking me to scan their cars. What did I get myself into. No in all honest I am happy to help.
customer_reviews.author: TinaJB

customer_reviews.title: Great DIY Tool to have
customer_reviews.text: I recently added paddle shifters on my car that had a multifunction steering wheel. After installing the shifters, the airbag warning light came on and stayed on. Internet search pointed me to this diagnostic tool that indicated it will reset most warning lights when working on cars similar to mine. Bought this from Amazon and it's definitely worth it. I would have paid more to have the dealer reset the airbag light.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Sands

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner
customer_reviews.text: The MD802 is a great scanner. It displays live data, resets codes, and graphs data points. Used the Autel update and there's cars supported that I've never even heard of. I used it to help my son check out some used cars he was interested in. Hope to move up to an Autel tablet with bidirectional controls eventually. Until then, the MD802 will help me keep "the fleet" operational.
customer_reviews.author: combatjumpmaster

customer_reviews.title: Register?
customer_reviews.text: I bought a MD802 and tried to register it so i could update it, When I enter the serial number and model number it tells me "invalid user name/password." Email after email to Autel trying to get it this fixed but I never receive a response. Customer service is so far a failure but luckily the MD802 is a nice piece. This tool isn't bi-directional so you can't send commands to the vehicle. So far it's been able to read all the codes on the few I've tried (GMC, Chevrolet, Ford, Nissan, Saturn and a dodge.) It does what I need it to do and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: All looks great. Download went well. I haven't used it yet, but all appears good. Only reason not a 5 star is software update cd was broken on arrival. I did use the online download and sent Autel an email so hopefully I get a cd. Again however, the online download seemed to work fine. I did not find the update hard at all. I just went to Autels website and went into the support link. It did take awhile though. I also only loaded the north American vehicle updates. No need for Skoda And Citroen etc. data. I did not use the maxidas site, it brought up nothing at maxidas. I will update review after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: A capable and upgradeable scan tool!
customer_reviews.text: A great scan tool for the price. It's allowed me to diagnose and reset several issues on many vehicles, including Ford, Chevrolet, BMW, Mercedes-Benz and Volvo. It's not the fastest tool nor the easiest to understand if you don't have some experience working on cars, so I'm not sure I'd recommend this for someone that has no experience with diagnostics or automotive work. That said, it's not too difficult to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher N.

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once so far to diagnose a transmission issue and it worked great. Allowed my to read/reset the code as well as to read in real time/record different parameters like vehicle rpms, transmission solenoid activation, etc. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: This thing ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: We had an older model but it didn't handle the ABS system. This recently saved us hundreds of dollars on a repair for sensors on my son's Jeep.
customer_reviews.author: Kuhlmom

customer_reviews.title: Annual updates cost money after one year, and warranty is over
customer_reviews.text: I wanted one of these for years!! I do most of my own work, and trouble shooting. My friends, neighbors, and family always call me when they have problems,( I'm a retired aircraft mechanic ). This makes me a hero, and saves me a lot of time trying to figure it out. I don't always fix their problems, just tell them what is probably wrong. (I will do the easy fixes though).
customer_reviews.author: Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice scanner to have
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is very easy to use and capable of reading codes of many cars. I’ve used it on 6 cars without any problems. It’s very worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos S.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect on BMWs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect scan tool for BMWs. It scans all the modules. I tell all my BMW customers to buy this and keep it in their car or truck. The first time the car goes into limp mode and you don't have to tow your car, it pays for itself. Trust me!!! It is my back up at my shop! Highly recommend this scan tool.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: How to use the device to get the best info out of it
customer_reviews.text: I use it cause I am a mechanic so on daily basis I get vehicles I need to check the codes to see what's wrong with them and need to see the live data too this tool does that for me and more.
customer_reviews.author: eduardo lara

customer_reviews.title: You must upgrade software...then this is great tool😀
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this product was BS... kept getting no comm. w/ SRS on new Infiniti Q50 and qx60. I returned lower model and was ready to box this one up too. You need to follow the steps to upgrade software; then the magic begins!!! I rebuild collision vehicles everyday and I think this is one of the best additions to my machines for the dollar. Good luck and put in that hour or so upgrading software and you will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: brianna phelps

customer_reviews.title: Best Scanner!
customer_reviews.text: Does more than any plug in scanner I have tried, I have tried many. I read off many codes on my 04 volvo's and it was even able to see codes about the convertible top. I also have vida dice, and this is so much quicker and easier
customer_reviews.author: keith g jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the adapter for my BMW. I've used it to diagnose many makes/models and even troubleshoot with the live data feature. It has been worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter Thunderwood

customer_reviews.title: Wow its great, arrived early Sunday
customer_reviews.text: Wow its great, arrived early Sunday. thanks Amazon. I plugged in reset the air bag codes on my 2013 W204 C-Class Mercedes Benz. I had removed the drivers seat to clean it, Mercedes send an air bag code the computer when the plug is disconnected. I had purchased another model form amazon but it didn’t communicate with the car. I returned it and ordered the Autel MD802 maxidiag elite now I have to try my truck. It did take me a few days to figure out which one would work with my car Autel has several models.
customer_reviews.author: lsajs

customer_reviews.title: Not very intuitive, but has many features.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it after reading all the reviews. Confusing to use and not very intuitive. Tried erasing codes off my truck and couldn't. Due to lack of users manual, I felt stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: It does what as describe in the website
customer_reviews.text: It's a Lil bit confusing if you're not familiar with advanced scanners. Other than that, it worked on my 03 jeep,13 Buick,2000 Audi,05 Mercedes,10 Corolla. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Repair Shop Saver
customer_reviews.text: Got this to diagnose various problems with emissions, thermostats, electrical for 2001 and also 2997 Nissan cars. Works AWESOME! GREAT investment & you can skip the expensive car dealers & repair shop fees!
customer_reviews.author: B. Y.  & E.Y

customer_reviews.title: Its a great tool for modern vehicles
customer_reviews.text: This tool is fairly easy to use. I like that it can clear codes. I solved a smog problem with the tool and it allowed the vehicle to pass smog. its an essential tool for the home mechanic.
customer_reviews.author: Campbase

customer_reviews.title: A good addition to the toolbox
customer_reviews.text: This code reader/diag tool is a big improvement over the simple one that I owned. It covers a LOT of cars, but it does not have Aston-Martin models in the menu. With some fiddling I could substitute successfully another Euro brand/model and it worked on the Vantage V8. A good addition to the toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Autel MD802
customer_reviews.text: At the moment I like, there are couple of things that it don't do and that's read 1996 OBDII Dodge truck at all. Not sure what to think of that, and it will lock up on doing a scan on my 2002 Dakota & Chrysler Town & Country while doing the Auto scan when it comes to the stereo stuff, but it will do the rest of what I really need it to do in manual.
customer_reviews.author: Moparlee

customer_reviews.title: Great Handheld Scanner To Have!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well with all make of vehicles it was used on. Clear description of DTC's. Very fast and reliable. All system scan is an excellent feature. ABS,SRS, Transmission and Engine Codes makes it an ideal multi system handheld scan tool.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: If it would fix the problem I would give it 10 stars. I used it on 3 different cars so far and it has paid for it's self. The problems were minor and fixed for less than $100. Very comforting feeling not being a slave to the dealer with the Mercedes
customer_reviews.author: RM Raff

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: too slow or complicate first sound seem okay but not
customer_reviews.author: albert lee cha

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you work on your own vehicles.
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is a must for those of us who do as much auto repair as possible. This is a full function device unlike the cheapo ones that will only read a fault code. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my 2000 Porsche Boxster 986
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use this tool to reset the dreaded SRS airbag light on my 2000 986 Boxster
customer_reviews.author: Rip

customer_reviews.title: Works but can be slow
customer_reviews.text: It does everything stated but it is a little on the slow side when reading data from the systems. Also in order to update you need to have a SD card reader that plugs into your USB port on your computer otherwise it will not read the card.
customer_reviews.author: Erica C.

customer_reviews.title: The main reason I purchased this was to retract the ...
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I purchased this was to retract the parking brake servos on my 2016 Subaru. The one thing it doesn't do. It will run a full diagnostic on the rest of the car, but when you pick EPB, Subaru is not even listed.
customer_reviews.author: Rider for life

customer_reviews.title: The MD802 is easily updated from the Auteltech website (though the manual refers ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, and quickly cleared trouble codes for my Mercedes Benz. The MD802 is easily updated from the Auteltech website (though the manual refers to maxidas website for updates). Once you download the software for the pc, a list of vehicles is presented on the screen, along with the current software version. You update the MD802 by selecting one or several vehicles, or all. The update is written to the SD card, which is then inserted back to the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Bill N

customer_reviews.title: Bad product bad service
customer_reviews.text: scanner advertises srs capability , i tried on gm silverado , did there recommendation of upgrade , after buying a card reader, still didnt work , called Autel , they would not send me another , had no solutions , i bought from amazon called them and offered me half my money back . Bad product bad service
customer_reviews.author: tom d.

customer_reviews.title: i think that it was a great purchase and i would recommend any one starting out ...
customer_reviews.text: i have been using this tool for 2 years its worth the investment. it takes time to learn how to use it. i think that it was a great purchase and i would recommend any one starting out with a low budget to purchase this tool. make sure to purchase a larger capacity memory card to enable updates , preferably 16gb.overall its a good tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Cleared all codes on my Mercedes ml320 including transmission and processor codes. Also pulled the vehicle out of limp mode. Reads all errors well. Also used successfully on a grand marquis.
customer_reviews.author: Joe F.

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for the money
customer_reviews.text: The MD802 was able to reset the SRS light in my Volvo, something you always have to go to the dealer for so that was impressive. This tool seems like it can do quite a bit, but is hindered by a slightly clunky interface, being that it comes from China. It's confusing because on the home screen there is an OBDII function, & a "scan" function that are two different things. I wonder why the OBDII functions aren't just incorporated into the broad "scan" option. Overall I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Be Where, False Advertisement.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer be where. I talked to someome at Autel over the phone he said the MaxiDiag MD802 would work with my 2001 Dodge Durango. It DON'T, it only reads back to 2003. I urge you to do Excessive home work before you waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Dillard

customer_reviews.title: very helpful, saves time and $
customer_reviews.text: got this for my son in law for christmas... he’s already fixed 3 Vehicles using this... i had also bought the book.... need this, very helpful for the codes... i would buy again.,
customer_reviews.author: cathy evango

customer_reviews.title: read them fine, deleted old codes with no issues
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to read SRS codes on 03 kia optima, read them fine, deleted old codes with no issues. Also tried it on an 04 explorer with door ajar chime going off continuously, told me what door sensor was faulty, saving a lot of time. good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to watch videos before trying to use
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for use are hard to understand and it takes quite a few steps to set this up before using. I was hoping for a plug and go code reader as indicated in the ad.
customer_reviews.author: mrscahughes

customer_reviews.title: not able to view live data like I had expected
customer_reviews.text: can read codes and clear most. not able to view live data like I had expected. Not easy to update.
customer_reviews.author: M Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Does the basic OBD II stuff. Works quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Description says: "Ability to quickly Read and Clear codes in ALL modules". It identified the SRS fault code and after the repair it was able to clear the code as advertised. Well worth the price IMO.
customer_reviews.author: nobody

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The scanner works great. Problem is, the update website given no longer exists. Therefore, no updates. Lame
customer_reviews.author: roger johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A bit slow, support isn't the best, but for the price this unit has features that exceed $1200 Snap-On units. A must buy for the pro home mechanic.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: best portable diagnostic scanner money can buy, well worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Autel makes great Diagnostic products. This tool is Great for Nissan Throttle body relearn .
customer_reviews.author: Alex Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Have to download new software before use tech was impatient  good thing is software is free for life
customer_reviews.text: Works well but does not describe codes had to download new software before use tech was very impatient
customer_reviews.author: Vernon & Carla Sturgeon

customer_reviews.title: Product description is wrong
customer_reviews.text: Does not work for 2012 chevy cruze ltz 1.4 product description says for all vehicles
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: wish the update were a bit easyer i was having some trouble but the product is awsome ps be carefull not to bend any of the connecters aspecialy if you use allot check every time to make sure they are all up and straight and be gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy.M.

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Good device hard to understand at first but good for pulling up codes and trouble shooting
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my sprinter van. A little quirky with the menu interface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my 2004 sprinter
customer_reviews.text: Seems to scan all modules through the sprinter menu. I won't drive without this thing - It can reset limp home modes to get you to a shop or home.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: I like it, love it
customer_reviews.text: I like it, love it. I am not a mechanic. Easy to use it`s saved me 400/500 dollars very easy in a month. I can use it for almost every car in the family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations. Have been able to diagnose 2007 ...
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectations. Have been able to diagnose 2007 Silverado vapor recovery system and repair problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Good value and product
customer_reviews.text: It takes a minute to get used to the menus but this does the trick for everything I have needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: scott davis

customer_reviews.title: For the money this thing is amazing. Update was easy
customer_reviews.text: I work on cars on the side a bit and have used this on several different makes. Ford,lexus,acura,nissan,Chevrolet and a few others. For the money this thing is amazing. Update was easy. It reads alot of information. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Wilhoit

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tool.
customer_reviews.text: Used it to turn off seatbelt code in my Volvo v70. Ez to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lousy customer service
customer_reviews.text: Not able to update past 2013 Asian vehicles. Contacted customer service twice about this and no help....
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product if you need an Airbag diagnostic tool
customer_reviews.text: The device worked on both of my Ford vehicles to identify the airbag problem. Had a little trouble with the software since the CD shipped was broken, but the vendor responded to my questions quickly and we got through it. I would recommend this product if you need an Airbag diagnostic tool.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: B. Vice

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work good after you get it updated
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work good after you get it updated. I had to hunt down an sd card adapter to attach it to the pc and the update process seemed a little complicated but works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best tool for the price
customer_reviews.text: does a lot for the price, live data stream is slow though. does abs, airbag, wheel speed sensors. best tool for the price, just wish the live data would update faster than every 5 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: gtp1998

customer_reviews.title: Listed vehicle coverage  incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t cover the all the modules or the vehicles listed on the Autel website. Tech support said sorry, just return it and buy one that costs $2000.
customer_reviews.author: sluggo

customer_reviews.title: Very good Scanner to buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good scanner ,simple & easy to use whether you are Pro or DIY . Strong build with a nice storage case .Highest point :the scanner works with all domestic or foreign OBD2. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: VINH P DOAN

customer_reviews.title: nice case. If you need to do upgrades - ...
customer_reviews.text: It works. Pulls engine and ABS codes as I need them, nice case. If you need to do upgrades - READ THE INSTRUCTIONS. Save you a lot of grief.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Gilley

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared
customer_reviews.text: This scan tool is for someone who is familiar with scan tool operation and has some understanding on how to deal with updating software. Cons There are practically no instructions on how to register the product, update the software, or operate it. Nuff said. If another reviewer did not give great instructions on how to register and update, I would have returned it. Pros This tool will scan and read all VOLVO codes. All codes - brakes, body, drive train, engine, air bags. You have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: L. Luksik

customer_reviews.title: Diagnostics made easy.
customer_reviews.text: Does quite a bit more that scan. Nice unit at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Howie

customer_reviews.title: Best scanner I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best scanner I've ever had. It scanned 40 modules on my W220 Mercedes S-class. It can't do any changes, but can read absolutely anything.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use/Complete module scanning and Live Date from each module is very beneficial.
customer_reviews.text: Great Scanner. Update covers a lot of models. Worked great on my gm and ford vehicles. Lifetime updates is a huge plus!
customer_reviews.author: Jaymen Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great price for all the features.
customer_reviews.text: I've used it to check for issues on several cars/trucks.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool. Quickly reset SRS (airbag) light on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool. Quickly reset SRS (airbag) light on my 2008 Volvo v70 and avoided a costly trip to the dealer. It also worked with my 2016 VW Passat.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaK

customer_reviews.title: A Scan Tool that works beyond my expectations for an incredible price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tool! Diagnoses all systems; It even showed my Driver Heated Seat back had failed. Shows historic codes not seen by cheap scan tools. I highly recommend as the best tool for the best price on the web.
customer_reviews.author: D Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good diagnostic tool, many features, too much to list.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, doesn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: Solid product, works fantastic if you own foreign vehicles and hate running to a dealership every time the dash throws you a light!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: READ THE BOOK FIRST
customer_reviews.text: will not reset ESP , or reset steering position . Need to read book more ,maybe I missed something. Some details are not clear. Overall it is a good unit.
customer_reviews.author: old mechanic

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic purchase! It is the best one on the market (as of my purchase date) and it works exactly as it should. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: its ok but freezes on a regular basis
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this for my shop. It works pretty well. Has amazing features for the price. However, it freezes nearly every time I do a full-system scan on any car. Highly annoying. Made in China but for the price its hard to complain.
customer_reviews.author: dusendorf

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner. Best scanner /dollar ratio
customer_reviews.text: I used an otc Genesis for years that cost 3k and this scanner does pretty much everything the otc does (as far as a scanner not a scope or gas analyzer). I would recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Metripod67

customer_reviews.title: this saved my but several times already. a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: this saved my but several times already. a lot of updates in the beginning. not so much later. don't go crazy getting a very large SD.
customer_reviews.author: Rolly Sonico

product_meta.title: Autel 4 System Scanner MD806 Car Diagnostic Tool Diagnoses for ABS, Engine, Transmission, SRS Full OBD2 Functions Car Scanner for Both Mechanics and DIYers
product_meta.description:
Autel Professional obd2 scanner MaxiDiag MD806 diagnostic scan tool 4 system code reader (Engine,Transmission,ABS and SRS) Diagnose OBDII/EOBD & PRE-OBDII VEHICLE
1. The diagnostic scanner MaxiDiag MD806 is the most advanced and multifunctional scan tool powered by its exclusive technology
2. designed for technicians to troubleshoot the basic four systems for most of major vehicles on the road today
3. This new diagnostic platform delivers fast and easy diagnosis at the right price 
4. With the optional OBD-I adapter set, The MaxiDiag MD806 can diagnose older vehicles. makes your vehicle service experience much more pleasant

Product Features & Functions
1. One tool can do it all-reads and clears trouble codes on the basic 4 systems ( Engine, Transmission, ABS and SRS ) 
2. Turns off warning lights
3. Supports all 10 test modes of the latest J1979 OBD II test specs, including Read Codes, Erase Codes, Live Data, Freeze Frame, I/M Readiness, O2 Mon. Test, On-Board Mon. Test Component Test and Vehicle Information
4. Enhanced OBD II Mode 6 
5. OBD II code tips guide technicians to the root cause of trouble code faster
6. Data graphing
7. EPB,oil reset function
8. Life-time free software upgrade, Software upgradeable via internet
9. Prints data via PC Suite

Vehicle Coverage
Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota, Lexus, Scion, for Honda, Acura, Subaru, Mitsubishi, Suzuki, Isuzu, Hyundai, Kia, Daewoo, Mazda, Holden, Bens, Smart, Sprinter, Maybach, BWM, Mini, VW, Seat, Skoda, Audi, Opel, Land Rover, Jaguar, Volvo, Porsche, Saab, EU Ford, Vauxhall, Ford , GM, Chrysler, Peugeot, Citroen, Renault, Dacia, Fiat, Abarth, Alfa-Romeo, Maserati, Lancia.
feature_bullets: 【4 systems diagnosis】: quickly reads/clears trouble codes on 4 available systems (including engine, transmission, ABS and SRS) for most of the European, Asian and Domestic vehicles after 1996.

【Advanced Features】: Oil Reset, Electronic Parking Brake Release, Steering Angle Sensor Calibration, Diesel Particulate Filter Service, Battery Management System Service, all above 7 special services are supported in this scanner for enhanced vehicle performance.

【Full OBD2 functions】: fully OBD2 diagnostics and special reset service, such as: including read/erase codes, Live data, freeze frame, retrieving I/M readiness status, O2 monitor test, on-board monitor test, component test, viewing vehicle information, modules Present, DTC look up, EPB, oil reset service.
【Wide vehicle coverage】: performs deep vehicle system coverage for all available Electronic systems and access to the body, chassis, power train and on-board communication modules.
【After sale commitment】: free software update for lifetime and one year warranty insurance.Welcome to get technical support via ▶support-amazon@autelonline.com◀.

specifications.Special Features: Diagnose side detection system, Reads and clears EPB/SBC trouble codes, Resets oil service mileage/maintenance, Reads live data stream and freeze frame, Turns off the ECU and brake warning light, Opens and closes the brake pads, Multi-brand applications,Complete OBDII/EOBD coverage, Read transmission fluid temperature, Reads and clears trouble codes on 4 systems
specifications.Vehicle Service Type: Nissan, Infiniti, Toyota, Lexus, Scion, for Honda, Acura, Subaru, Mitsubishi, Suzuki, Isuzu, Hyundai, Kia, Daewoo, Mazda, Holden, Bens, Smart, Sprinter, Maybach, BWM, Mini, VW, Seat, Skoda, Audi, Opel, Land Rover, Jaguar, Volvo, Porsche, Saab, EU Ford, Vauxhall, Ford , GM, Chrysler, Peugeot, Citroen, Renault, Dacia, Fiat, Abarth, Alfa-Romeo, Maserati, Lancia.
